entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains this evening. Amount 2 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
